name: Microwave Samsung (ME88SUW/BW)
origAbout: The durable BIOceramic coating is easy to clean and won't scratch. Its smooth surface can be cleaned without harsh cleaning agents. In addition, the coating does not lose color after long-term use. Accelerated defrost: this function allows you to defrost food quickly and evenly. You can enjoy the great taste of your favorite food at any time of the year.
